tool_description: Searches for available meeting rooms based on location, capacity, time slot, and equipment requirements.

start_time.description: Meeting start time in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Meeting end time in ISO 8601 format

room_type.description: Preferred room type (conference, huddle, boardroom, auditorium)

error_messages: Invalid location: Location identifier not found in system.
Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time and in valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid capacity: min_capacity must be between 1 and 200.
Invalid room type: room_type must be one of conference, huddle, boardroom, auditorium.
Equipment not available: One or more requested equipment types not available at location.
usage: Specify location, time range, capacity needs, and optional equipment requirements. Returns list of available rooms matching criteria.

room_details.description: Detailed information about each available room

total_found.description: Total number of available rooms found
